overview:
Brian Bray serves as the Vice President of Operations. Bray comes to AutoClaims Direct with over 12 years experience in the Auto Insurance claims industry. He was a former claims supervisor for Mercury Insurance, a multi billion dollar California based insurer.

Brian Bray has been catalyst in ACD’s revamped leadership team and has been a key factor in helping the organization win it’s 4th consecutive ranking on Inc. Magazine’s list of Fastest Growing Private Companies in America, 3rd consecutive ranking Deloitte’s Technology Fast 500 of North America and recently a 2012 winner of the Red Herring 100 Americas technology award and a 3rd straight ranking on Lead411’s Technology 200.

Bray oversees all operations and has worked to acquire leading claims industry talent in 2012 which enabled ACD to continue it’s 9 year streak of continued growth.
